title: Sept or Oct Move in, Close to Major T stops, ht/hw incl, nice unit
posting_body: ['Beacon Hill | Boston | MA', 'Rent: $2575 including Heat and Hot Water', 'Available: September 1, 2022', 'This renovated one bedroom apartment available for rent is located on the second floor of a', 'traditional Beacon Hill Brownstone on Myrtle Street.', 'FEATURING:', '*Separate Granite Kitchen', '*Good Sized Bedroom', '*Hardwood Flooring', '*Common Laundry in the Building', '*Bike Storage in Building', '*NO FEE, Landlord Will Pay Realtor Fee if a 2 Year Lease is Signed', '*Heat and Hot Water Included in the Monthly Rent', "*Located on Myrtle Street Between Anderson and Grove Streets in Boston's Beacon Hill", 'Neighborhood', '*Only Steps from All Major T Lines and Public Transportation', '*Quick Access to All Expressways', '*Walking Distance to MGH, North Station, Wholefoods, Charles River, Charles Street,', 'Financial District, Government Center, etc.']
